MacroOp.Name: OMNI_WIN_API
MacroOp.Brief: Defines whether to use straight Windows API or CRT functions.
MacroOp.Description:
If this macro is defined, then the direct Windows API calls will be used instead of the WinCRT functions.
For example, in omni::sync::thread when a thread is spawned, if this macro is defined then CreateThread is used, while if this macro is not defined then _beginthreadex is utilized.
MacroOp.PlatformSpecific: This macro option only applies to Windows platforms and will have no effect if defined on a non Windows platform.
MacroOp.Synopsis: #define OMNI_WIN_API If defined, will change certain functions used.
